name: Purgatory (itch) (Neepsy, yasminhaq, Crawford_Catherine, DavidLiu2, Figueroa)
description:
Made in 72 Hours for UT Game Jam 2021! The theme this year was "In Between".

You find yourself in a void between realities, a liminal space of sorts. Can you find your way out?

The webgl has reduced graphical quality in order to maximize performance on browsers. Playing the downloadable version is highly recommended for the best experience!

Credits:

  • Eric Li - Programming and Design
  • Catherine M Crawford - 3D Artist/ Prop Designer
  • Santiago Figueroa - Artsy Programmer
  • David Liu - Sound Programmer
  • Yasmin Haq - Level Design and UI??

Assets Used

  • Volumetric Fog Shader by AE Tuts
  • Walking SFX by FesliyanStudios
  • Teleport SFX by oldestmillennial on FreeSound
